mapper.sql: UnitId, UnitName, Address, MSPeople, MSPhone, Status, DicItemId, Memo
mapper.insert: insert into unit (UnitId, UnitName, Address, MSPeople, MSPhone, Status, DicItemId, Memo) values (#{unitid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unitname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mspeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{dicitemid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into unit
UnitId,

Memo,

mapper.update:
update unit
UnitName = #{unitname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MSPeople = #{mspeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MSPhone = #{msphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
DicItemId = #{dicitemid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where UnitId = #{unitid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
